document_data.name: Eyebright
document_data.mainbody: '''Eyebright''' was a rare flowering [[herb]] that grew in some swamps.
document_data.Uses:
Eyebright had astringent properties that made it good for treating eye infections. Skilled healers could use the flower to craft a [[medicine|medical]] ointment to treat [[sight rot]].

It was also used as a [[material component]] for certain [[spell]]s: powdered eyebright was used to prepare an ointment involved in the casting of ''[[reveal]]'' while its juice was used in casting ''[[glyph of revealing]]''.
